1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 
3 import rospy
4 
5 # Command Status
6 from niryo_robot_msgs.msg import CommandStatus
7 
8 # Services
9 from tools_interface.srv import PingDxlTool
10 from tools_interface.srv import ToolCommand
11 from niryo_robot_rpi.srv import SetDigitalIO
12 from niryo_robot_rpi.srv import SetIOMode, SetIOModeRequest
13 
14 
15 class ToolRosCommandInterface:
16 
17  def __init__(self, state_ros_communication_problem):
18  self._digital_outputs = rospy.get_param("/niryo_robot_rpi/digital_outputs")
19 
20  namespace = rospy.get_param("~namespace_topics")
21  self.__service_open_gripper = rospy.ServiceProxy(namespace + 'open_gripper',
22  ToolCommand)
23  self.__service_close_gripper = rospy.ServiceProxy(namespace + 'close_gripper',
24  ToolCommand)
25 
26  self.__service_pull_air_vacuum_pump = rospy.ServiceProxy(namespace + 'pull_air_vacuum_pump',
27  ToolCommand)
28  self.__service_push_air_vacuum_pump = rospy.ServiceProxy(namespace + 'push_air_vacuum_pump',
29  ToolCommand)
30 
31  self.__service_ping_dxl_tool = rospy.ServiceProxy(namespace + 'ping_and_set_dxl_tool', PingDxlTool)
32 
33  self.__service_activate_digital_output_tool = rospy.ServiceProxy('/niryo_robot_rpi/set_digital_io',
34  SetDigitalIO)
35  self.__service_setup_digital_output_tool = rospy.ServiceProxy('/niryo_robot_rpi/set_digital_io_mode',
36  SetIOMode)
37 
38  self.__state_ros_communication_problem = state_ros_communication_problem
39  rospy.logdebug("Interface between Tools Commander and ROS Control has been started.")
40 
41  # Gripper
42 
43  def open_gripper(self, gripper_id, open_position, open_speed, open_hold_torque, open_max_torque):
44  self.__service_open_gripper(id=gripper_id, position=open_position, speed=open_speed,
45  hold_torque=open_hold_torque, max_torque=open_max_torque)
46  return True
47  # try:
48  # resp = self.__service_open_gripper(id=gripper_id, position=open_position, speed=open_speed,
49  # hold_torque=open_hold_torque, max_torque=open_max_torque)
50  # return resp.state
51  # except rospy.ServiceException:
52  # rospy.logerr("ROS Tool Interface - Failed to Open Gripper")
53  # return self.__state_ros_communication_problem
54 
55  def close_gripper(self, gripper_id, close_position, close_speed, close_hold_torque, close_max_torque):
56  resp = self.__service_close_gripper(id=gripper_id, position=close_position,
57  speed=close_speed, hold_torque=close_hold_torque,
58  max_torque=close_max_torque)
59  return True
60  # try:
61  # resp = self.__service_close_gripper(id=gripper_id, position=close_position,
62  # speed=close_speed, hold_torque=close_hold_torque,
63  # max_torque=close_max_torque)
64  # return resp.state
65  # except rospy.ServiceException:
66  # rospy.logerr("ROS Tool Interface - Failed to Close Gripper")
67  # return self.__state_ros_communication_problem
68 
69  # Vacuum
70  def pull_air_vacuum_pump(
71  self, vp_id, vp_pull_air_velocity, vp_pull_air_position,
72  vp_pull_air_max_torque, vp_pull_air_hold_torque):
73  try:
74  resp = self.__service_pull_air_vacuum_pump(
75  id=vp_id, speed=vp_pull_air_velocity, position=vp_pull_air_position,
76  max_torque=vp_pull_air_max_torque, hold_torque=vp_pull_air_hold_torque)
77  return resp.state
78  except rospy.ServiceException:
79  rospy.logerr("ROS Tool Interface - Failed to Pull Air")
80  return self.__state_ros_communication_problem
81 
82  def push_air_vacuum_pump(self, vp_id, vp_push_air_velocity, vp_push_air_position, vp_push_air_max_torque):
83  try:
84  resp = self.__service_push_air_vacuum_pump(id=vp_id, speed=vp_push_air_velocity,
85  position=vp_push_air_position, max_torque=vp_push_air_max_torque,
86  hold_torque=0)
87  return resp.state
88  except rospy.ServiceException:
89  rospy.logerr("ROS Tool Interface - Failed to Push Air")
90  return self.__state_ros_communication_problem
91 
92  # Others
93  def ping_dxl_tool(self):
94  try:
95  resp = self.__service_ping_dxl_tool()
96  if (resp is not None):
97  return resp.state, resp.tool.id
98  else:
99  return CommandStatus.TOOL_ROS_INTERFACE_ERROR, "Cannot ping dxl tool"
100  except rospy.ServiceException:
101  rospy.logerr("ROS Tool Interface - Failed to Ping Dynamixel Tool - "
102  "An error has occurred or another ping was running")
103  return CommandStatus.TOOL_ROS_INTERFACE_ERROR, "Cannot ping dxl tool"
104 
105  def digital_output_tool_setup(self, gpio_name):
106  if rospy.get_param("/niryo_robot/hardware_version") in ['ned2', 'ned3pro']:
107  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Success"
108 
109  try:
110  resp = self.__service_setup_digital_output_tool(gpio_name, SetIOModeRequest.OUTPUT) # set output
111  return resp.status, resp.message
112  except rospy.ServiceException:
113  rospy.logerr("ROS Tool Interface - Failed to get digital output setup")
114  return CommandStatus.TOOL_ROS_INTERFACE_ERROR, "Digital IO panel service failed"
115 
116  def digital_output_tool_activate(self, gpio_name, activate):
117  try:
118  resp = self.__service_activate_digital_output_tool(gpio_name, bool(activate))
119  return resp.status, resp.message
120  except rospy.ServiceException:
121  rospy.logerr("ROS Tool Interface - Failed to activate digital output")
122  return CommandStatus.TOOL_ROS_INTERFACE_ERROR, "Digital IO panel service failed"
